meanings.sent1: I will purchase a new book at the store.
meanings.sent2: She decided to purchase a ticket for the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to purchase a mouse toy online.
meanings.sent4: His determination to purchase success was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The idea of purchasing a dream seemed within reach.

meanings.definition: firm hold or grip on something
meanings.sent1: He tightened his purchase on the handlebar.
meanings.sent2: The rock climber's purchase on the cliff was secure.
meanings.sent3: The monkey's purchase on the branch was comical.
meanings.sent4: Her purchase on reality slipped away.
meanings.sent5: The wrestler's purchase on his opponent was unbreakable.

meanings.sent1: The antique vase was a valuable purchase.
meanings.sent2: His latest purchase was a new laptop.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected purchase of a puppy brought joy.
meanings.sent4: Her purchase of happiness was evident in her smile.
meanings.sent5: The wise man's purchase of knowledge enriched his life.
